name: Hand of Fate, a card game that comes to life
blurb: Hand of Fate brings card gaming to video game life.  An infinitely replayable series of quests; build your deck, then try to defeat it!

rewards.reward:

$200* USD  THE TABLETOP GAME
==============================
An actual size cast bronze Meeple (figurine) as well as two Hand of Fate tarot decks enables you to accurately recreate the Hand of Fate experience at home.

Not included: Mysterious Dealer with malevolent intentions.

============================== + 2 TAROT DECKS + PHYSICAL BOXED COPY + T-SHIRT + ALPHA ACCESS + ADDITIONAL COPY + 4 EXCLUSIVE ALPHA CARDS + DIGITAL ART BOOK + BETA ACCESS + 2 EXCLUSIVE BETA CARDS + DIGITAL COPY of the game + IN GAME BACKER CARD + access to BACKER ONLY forum + NAME IN CREDITS as a Kickstarter backer.

$500* USD GAME MASTER
==============================
Create an ENCOUNTER for Hand of Fate!  We'll take your suggestions and description, and create a CARD OF YOUR DESIGN that will feature in the game, with the gameplay you suggest.  We'll also send through an autographed print of the original card art.  Also includes an additional PHYSICAL COPY of the game, so you can show off your creation, and a DESIGN credit.
============================== + MEEPLE + 2 TAROT DECKS + 2 PHYSICAL BOXED COPIES + T-SHIRT + ALPHA ACCESS + ADDITIONAL COPY + 4 EXCLUSIVE ALPHA CARDS + DIGITAL ART BOOK + BETA ACCESS + 2 EXCLUSIVE BETA CARDS + DIGITAL COPY of the game + IN GAME BACKER CARD + access to BACKER ONLY forum + NAME IN CREDITS as a Kickstarter backer.

$2000* USD WEAPON MASTER ============================== Create a WEAPON for Hand of Fate! We'll take your suggestions and description, and create a CARD OF YOUR DESIGN that will feature in the game, along with a 3D model of the weapon that will appear in game. We'll also send through an autographed print of the original card art. Also includes an additional PHYSICAL COPY of the game, so you can show off your creation, and a DESIGN credit.  Excludes "GAME MASTER" reward.\r\n============================== + MEEPLE + 2 TAROT DECKS + 2 PHYSICAL BOXED COPIES + T-SHIRT + ALPHA ACCESS + ADDITIONAL COPY + 4 EXCLUSIVE ALPHA CARDS + DIGITAL ART BOOK + BETA ACCESS + 2 EXCLUSIVE BETA CARDS + DIGITAL COPY of the game + IN GAME BACKER CARD + access to BACKER ONLY forum + NAME IN CREDITS as a Kickstarter backer.

$3000* USD ONE WITH EVERYTHING
==============================
Come and spend a day in the Defiant Development studio (or remotely via videoconference) and see how the magic happens.  We will introduce you to the team and walk you through how you have contributed to the game.  

Includes all rewards below this, including designing your own encounter and weapon (as per "WEAPON MASTER" and "DUNGEON MASTER" rewards) and a DESIGN credit.

This does not include flights, accommodation or any travel costs.
============================== + DESIGN A WEAPON + DESIGN AN ENCOUNTER + MEEPLE + 2 TAROT DECKS + 2 PHYSICAL BOXED COPIES + T-SHIRT + ALPHA ACCESS + ADDITIONAL COPY + 4 EXCLUSIVE ALPHA CARDS + DIGITAL ART BOOK + BETA ACCESS + 2 EXCLUSIVE BETA CARDS + DIGITAL COPY of the game + IN GAME BACKER CARD + access to BACKER ONLY forum + NAME IN CREDITS as a Kickstarter backer.
